name: Joleado Live Chat Software
author: JOLEADO Systems

sections.installation:
1. In your wordpress admin, Under the heading plugins click on Add New.
  2. Search Joleado Live Chat Software in Search box.
  3. Locate Joleado Live Chat Software plugins in the search results.
  4. Click on Install Now Button.
  5. After that Click on Activate Button to activate your plugin.
  6. See the “Joleado chat Settings” menu on the left bar of your WordPress admin for setup.
sections.description:
Requires at least: 3.7
Tested up to: 4.9.x
Stable tag: 18.9.3
Version: 18.9.3
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Information

The plugin is sending the data to https://www.joleadosystem.com/ when filling the form to get the live chat code.

If you need any help with the plugin or searching for the documentation, please visit:

https://www.joleadosystem.com/

Useful links

  • [Info about Plugin] https://www.joleadosystem.com/free-wordpress-plugin/
  • [Contact] https://www.joleadosystem.com/contact/
